website_summaries.verdict: This first-rate Apple Watch case offers full-edge coverage to limit potential damage.
pros: Constructed from TPU material that is shock-absorbent
Includes an exact cutout based on an Apple Watch's design to ensure you can quickly and effortlessly recharge your device at any time
Lightweight case offers a terrific choice for everyday use
cons: Not sold with a screen protector
Case may scratch the back of an Apple Watch

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Great case that is still minimal in size. Does not add too much bulk while still protecting the bezel. ***TIP - If you own the 42mm watch and are buying a separate screen protector such as the Zagg or the Armorsuit Screen Protectors, purchase the 38mm Screen protector. It will fit perfectly with the Spigen case already installed. Otherwise the case will peel off any 42mm screen protector.*** ]
customer_reviews.author: John Hamlett

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and allows me to wear the watch while working with my hands, so I'm not worried about scratching it. Give the watch a more rugged/sportier look too. A must have!
customer_reviews.author: RockTheRed86

customer_reviews.title: Great case, I'm a cluts and always bang my watch on corners.
customer_reviews.text: Superb case for the Apple Watch, if you like the GShock feel/look. This is for you. It's not as bulky as a big old G shock though. Still slim on wrist. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Palma

customer_reviews.title: even at this price point I feel like some instructions for install would be beneficial to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m not impressed. The case is rugged enough, but, even at this price point I feel like some instructions for install would be beneficial to the customer. You need to put the button side in first and work the case around the rest of the watch. The little silver button on mine fell out of its slot but popped right back in. Also, there’s not a screen protector in the box as some videos indicated. So, if I want to keep this, I need a screen protector as well. I thought it would also cover the screen when I ordered it. I was wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: One of the better ones out there
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the better Apple Watch protectors that I had. Initially I had bought another one from Best Buy but was unhappy with it. This one is much more sturdy and does a better Job. Pros: Real nice Quality Good Protection Cons: Fiddly to get one The big "button" on the side seems to be kinda loose and does not hold well If dust gets under the protector it will scratch your watch over time I would rate this product 3,5 Stars but give it 4 out of Fairness. "Reviewing a better world. One product at a time" Follow me on AMAZON SPARK for honest reviews and product features. #NotSponsored #NoBias
customer_reviews.author: LeifTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Would work OK, but no something you take on and off.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the intention of slipping it on when I went bike riding, etc. It's not easy to get on, and if you have a screen protector on your Apple Watch, putting this cover on will mess up your screen protector. I ended up giving it to my son, and he likes it. To be fair, if you have this on, you probably don't really need a screen protector, but I didn't have the intention of leaving this case on all the time because it does make your watch look more "bulky".
customer_reviews.author: Pan

customer_reviews.title: Bulky dirt collector
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my Apple Watch as I figured I’d need one based on my unsuccessful use of the Fitbit. I went through three fitbits in the one year warranty period, so I thought I should get a case for my Apple Watch when I bought one. It was ugly, bulky, and collected a lot of dirt on its edges and in between the watch and case. I removed it 6 months ago and I have had no problems with damage to my Apple Watch. I don’t think you’ll need this.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie J. McNutt

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit for Apple Watch 3!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Spigen product line. Had one of these on my 1 Series Apple Watch and couldn’t wait until they made one for the 3 Series. The holes line up perfectly for the speaker and mic. With the case on the Watch, people can hear me just fine during a phone conversation and I can hear them crystal clear! This is a MUST for Apple Watch owners! See attached photos. Hopefully you found my review helpful! If so, please let me know. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Drewsak

customer_reviews.title: Such a simple but necessary device
customer_reviews.text: I’m a local truck driver and I’m constantly jumping in and out of my truck and hooking and unhooking from trailers all day. During the course of a day I bump my watch face several times. This is such a simple device that you wouldn’t think that it works, but it does. All the functions of my watch are accessible and the face is unobstructed. If I have one minor complaint is that depending on what you are doing there are times that while bending your wrist back it will occasionally hit the buttons. In my case it’s when I’m in the gym handling dumbbells.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Color changed after a month. Protection is good.
customer_reviews.text: We just recently bought the Apple Watch for my daughter. We bought a pink collar watch and bought this case in pink collar as well, for protection. It seems to be doing its job, but the color faded and turned more grayish after about a month and a half. We thought it’s dirty, so we washed it, but the gray tones still stayed. If color is of no concern to you, I would recommend this product. If you want to see the exact color as Apple Watch, look for another product.
customer_reviews.author: Hatalia

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was afraid of hitting the edges of a $250 watch and shattering it! I am not disappointed. I wear the watch every day and even though I try to be careful, things happen. The touch screen works well and it was very easy to install. It fits tightly so I don't worry about it coming off or getting snagged. My only complaint is that it doesn't have a cover for the face. It would be nice if they included a screen protector with it. The aftermarket one I bought isn't as good a quality as I know Spigen would make.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this, but after only a week the silver ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this, but after only a week the silver button on the side fell off. I'm a watch enthusiast and am not hard on watches at all so I was certainly surprised. I've had Spigen cases before for phones and they've been good quality--their watch case is lacking. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good case but the Tough Armor is better
customer_reviews.text: This case was OK, but I ordered it by accident, thinking I was getting the "Tough Armor" one by the same company, which has the built-in screen cover. This one does not. Four stars because I don't feel it is nearly as good a value as the other one, however if you use a different "stick on" type screen cover and want a Watch body only protector, I would recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: SirWill90

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!! Protect your investment!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a MUST HAVE if your an Apple Watch owner! I also have a ZAGG screen protector and this still fits perfect. So inexpensive and very protective. Protect your investment! Only ONE. con about this product which can both be a pro or con depending on the buyer. It does make your watch significantly bigger, if sleek and slim is your Forte then this isn’t for you. I like the bigger look for me so i love it but that is something to consider. All my watch bands fit perfectly with this as well.
customer_reviews.author: ExploreColorado

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my 42mm Series 3
customer_reviews.text: Great protection and a perfect fit for my Series 3 watch. Rather than wrestling it on over the wristband, I'd recommend sliding the band off the watch before installing the case -- it goes on much easier, and taking the band on and off is very easy. All the controls work perfectly with the case on the watch. I noticed that after a few weeks some junk seems to collect around the edges and under the case itself, but removing it, cleaning it and the watch, and re-installing it is no big deal. It does make the watch bigger, but that's a small price to pay for the protection it provides.
customer_reviews.author: gregger

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This protection case is awesome! I have been using it for years now (maybe about 4-5 years) and it has helped save my Apple Watch so many times! It doesn’t cause any issue with the touch screen, and I have never submerged my Apple Watch but I do watch my hands like crazy, and haven’t had any issues. I also use a Zagg screen protector on my Apple Watch screen, and using this sleeve doesn’t cause any issues. I highly recommend this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Reina Valle

customer_reviews.title: Protects watch decently
customer_reviews.text: The fit is not perfectly snug and the edges are flush with the top of the watch which means protection is limited but combined with tempered glass which i bought separately it does the job. I had put tempered glass a couple of times by itself which had chipped/peeled off pretty quickly. The combination has been on for about a month and has not fallen off or chipped so clearly the case in doing the job. It is not bulky and does not change the feel of the watch so i don't notice it. Worth the price for active and clumsy people like me who bang the watch constently
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for my Apple Watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Apple Watch protector I’ve had. The flexibility of it helps me get it around my watch face and the texture helps when I hit it up against things. The way it is made helps as anything I hit it on hits the case first before my screen. I have not had any scratches or dings since I put the case on. I love the color of it as the pink is not too loud and doesn’t stand out as much which is great for me being a law enforcement officer. I will definitely invest in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: court

customer_reviews.title: Great protector for the Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this awhile back for my Apple Watch and it works great. I've had the watch and case for awhile now and so far, no problems at all. No tears in the rubber and it seamlessly goes around the face of the watch so that it doesn't detract from the watch's appearance. It is somewhat difficult to get it off and then back on, but it keeps my watch protected, so not that big of an issue to me.
customer_reviews.author: Sully

customer_reviews.title: A must if you don't like scratches on your watch
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it makes the Apple watch much more bulky. However, if you wear your watch everyday, everywhere and are easily annoyed by scratches then this is a must have. I also have the Galaxy S3 Gear Frontier, but that watch is very durable. The Apple watch scratches if I give it a nasty look:) The cover is a must for me and now I am very happy with the watch and cover.
customer_reviews.author: elmattTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: I took the case off about 2 months later to clean my watch and it looked like someone took a brillo pad to my watch
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS CASE. This case left tiny scratches all over my stainless steel Watch. This was literally a new watch when I put the case on. I purchased the case because I cracked the screen of my old watch by dropping it. I purchased this case while my watch was being replaced and put it straight in the case. I took the case off about 2 months later to clean my watch and it looked like someone took a brillo pad to my watch. Customer service has not responded to my complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this case! It is not too big to the point where it looks bulky and if you combine it with a screen protector you know your watch will be safe from any bumps or scrapes!. I work outside with cars at my job and my previous apple watch had a lot of damage on it but I purchased this and have been using it for months on my new watch and now my watch looks brand new! The case is also designed so that once you put it on you have the intention of leaving it on as its a little difficult to take off. I like this feature because it holds my watch nice and snug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks & Feels Great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great!! After reading the reviews I guess I have to say this if you buy this case well any case for that matter don’t just leave it on your device #1 it’s disgusting #2 people that buy these type of items tend to truly care about the long Jeopardy of the item so my advice is once every other day take it off and clean with Alcohol wipes let dry and clean your device before replacing your case!! 🧐
customer_reviews.author: Chad LeDe

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been great. I've seen other reviews that mention wear and tear on their actual watch because of where the coverage of this protector is. Dust and dirt will get in crevices, so I see no issue with this as long as you take the protector off once a week or so and clean around the sensor to keep from wear and tear caused by dirt and grime.
customer_reviews.author: Kensley Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Protecting against hard hits.
customer_reviews.text: I tried others but they were cheap and not effective. None did the job and I had to replace the glass. I got this and it does the job well. I’ve smacked the watch hard on metal and no damage. It’s easy to remove in case I go to dinner and don’t want the silicone:Rubber look so I can show off my beautiful stainless steel Apple Watch.
customer_reviews.author: JPM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I just ordered a second as a backup. Keep in mind with any case that has movement against the watch, scratches can occur. If you take it apart can wash the watch and case with baby shampoo occasionally, there will be fewer scratches. I had doubts it would fit in my charger stand. But, it fits fine. I have a weird charger stand that looks like a little 1st Generation Apple Macintosh. I can't imagine a custom charger this won't work with. If the case was a tiny but thicker it wouldn't work, it is perfect. I hope the Apple Watch 4 fits it.... LOL :-)
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Lipschitz

customer_reviews.title: I bought this case over 3 years ago, and my watch still looks band new! The band... not so much :)
customer_reviews.text: I work with my hands and have scratched many watch faces. Even scratched one on a wall when walking down a hall. This little piece of rubber has protected my watch for years now. It may make the watch look a little bit bigger/bulkier, but it is a small price to pay for protecting a watch that cost me hundreds of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Just as described it is a great item to protect your watch.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it is designed to allow for quick and easy removal, also allowing the straps to be switched without a hassle, I have used others that they are difficult to put on the watch and they have their own strap when I have different ones in different colors so that defeated the purpose on the other ones but not on this Spigen case protector
customer_reviews.author: Francisco L.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection!
customer_reviews.text: Cant beat it for price concidering how much our watches cost. Iwatch should include such a case in first place for those of us in construction or just plain out door folks. Anyhoot, fits my iwatch 2 42mm like a glove and rubber is flexable and not hard like a good iphone case. Good shock protection im assuming. Well worth my money spent and i would recomend to friends. One piece, so no unsnapping or parts to go missing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. Connell

customer_reviews.title: I now use it for my Apple Watch series 4 but...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic piece of kit! I originally bought it for my Apple Watch series 3 and although I now use it on my series 4 I won’t recommend doing so since it may reduce microphone quality. I’ll try to modify mine since it won’t take me much effort to make proper clearances for mic and speakers. Btw it does provide excellent protection especially if you add a screen protector. Case also does NOT impede any of my Apple Watch series 4 watch face, crown or side button functions. This case seems durable enough to last me at least till the next couple series of Apple Watches. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Yo! Real Customer Here.

customer_reviews.title: Rugged as described, 4 1/2 years later and still like new
customer_reviews.text: I got this case around Nov ‘15 for my Apple Watch series 1, and still intact, resisting daily use, at the beach, mountains and anywhere that i traveled or go, my wife just get me a new Apple Watch Series 3 for my bday and also fit perfect so i’m buying another one for my new watch, almost 4 1/2 years using this case.
customer_reviews.author: Terranova

customer_reviews.title: Not the most useful Spigen Product
customer_reviews.text: I have had many different products from this company and have liked all of them. This particular product is nothing fancy. It is exactly as advertised. There is nothing to cover the screen of the product, which is to be expected. It is simple and it should work as the makers intended it to, you just need to figure out if this is what you want to protect your watch.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Even though I gave it all stars, but it does have one big issue. It starts accumulating dirt and sweat. Cleaning requires you to remove the whole housing which is not an easy process. Putting it back is another challenge. HUGE PLUS is that it does the job very well in protecting your valuable asset! It does fit very well on the watch.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Great protection, better price!
customer_reviews.text: The only one that wasn’t junk, Spigen makes pretty great protection. This was for my sometimes clumsy partner, he shattered a series 3 face down on a tile floor, we got him another one but with protection, this looks decent and offers great shock proof protection. I bought another one From a Chinese offbrand seller on amazon and it was bad. Get this Spigen one and save yourself a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Buy the new version of this
customer_reviews.text: This is the old version and because it does not have the plastic on the front the rubber of the case moves around and it caught the corners of the screen protector and pulled it up.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, paid it with a 3D screen protector and you can’t break it if you tried, without loosing you hand. The previous case I had made it almost impossible to turn the Digital Crown. This one goes around the whole watch, where the other one snapped on. Turning the Digital Crown is a lot smoother with this one. Any case that works will beef up your watch a little but this one still looks good. The picture I took today after being in use since October. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this one after receiving an iWatch the original as a gift, and of course I wanted it to be well protected. This case is great, it protect the sides, and it is easily to be mistaken as a part of the watch strap. Some may thing it is bulky ( of course it is not going to look like as if you don't have a case ). I got used to the look pretty fast as I know the watch is well protected. I also want to point out that the color for my iWatch is black, so it is a great fit, if you have another color like rose gold, you may not feel the same
customer_reviews.author: Joe The Expert

customer_reviews.title: Screen protector too small
customer_reviews.text: Screen protector too small the case seems sturdy and good but I bought it so that I could have both case and screen protector. The screen protector seems to be for the 38mm not the 42 which is the size of the cas I ended up having to buy another screen protector and spend more money. buy one that has both that fits unless you just looking for the case then it's pretty decent I would buy it again for the case alone
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It does a good job of pretecting the body. It also lays over the screen high enough to where it also protects the screen to an extent. I like it more than the last more expensive product that I purchased. I would definitely recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and sturdy bumper guard, great price
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy case to protect your Apple Watch. I ordered the OD green and it looks nice with a black band. Easy to install, won’t have to worry about scratching the watch. I’d recommend taking it out of the case every so often and rinsing any dirt or debris out of the case. Easy to install. Worth mentioning that it has a small lip above the actual screen for further protection
customer_reviews.author: J Mili

customer_reviews.title: Best case ever !
customer_reviews.text: I love this case !!!! It is a little bulky but I have cracked a previous watch before and I am so glad I found this case . After buying five other cases that didn’t work well for me I finally found the perfect case . Not only is it nice but it works for any busy mom with kids . Constantly carring kids and hitting my watch this case has protected it many times . Definitely a great buy !
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.text: I loved the case I thought it was awesome, until it came time to put a screen protector on my Apple Watch. It didn’t work out at all. Every time I put the case on my Apple Watch it would lift my screen protector causing air bubbles and eventually my screen protector would get ruined. I changed to a different brand of screen protectors and I still had the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great product for those annoying hit on objects.
customer_reviews.text: Great product to protect your Apple Watch from those bumps and knocks. I am a flatbed truck driver and my watch takes a beating some times. And this is the best product that keeps my watch safe. Personally I don’t like the rubber covered ones. Dirt, water, and just everything makes that touch screen even gayer to use. So this is the best solution with a glass cover if you want. The only down side is if you work in a dirty area or outside working a lot then it gets dirt under it. But it’s easy to just rinse and whip clean.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Claeys

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. The one I had before was way too extra protective and uncomfortable. I wanna something more slim a stylish. This does the job you expect it to. Doesn’t protect the screen much but does minimize the potential damage. I honestly think the Apple Watch should just naturally look like they case I have on.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Chanhma

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: I needed some sort of protection for my Apple Watch 3, because I kept hitting it against door frames. I tried a couple of silicon covers and didn't like them at all, due to how they affected look and functionality. Then I found this Spigen "bumper" and I love it. It actually helps the look of the watch, doesn't affect the functionality at all, and still protects my watch. Stylistically, it adds a little size to the watch face, which you may or may not find appealing. But the screen is left untouched, so it's still as responsive as it would be without any kind of protector on it.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Review Apple Watch protector.
customer_reviews.text: The device is what I expected but the wrist bands that slide thru the side band lock interfere so they don’t slide thru freely. These are the Velcro Straps. I bought different band to get around this. The device also adds bulk to watch and was not compatible when a glass protector from Zagg is used.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar D Hettrich

customer_reviews.title: COULD NOT PUT IT ON MY WATCH!
customer_reviews.text: I spent around 40 minutes trying to put the case on and I couldn't. I really tried. I checked the size and it is a 42" just like my watch. It didn't come with instructions. I watched at least 6 videos on how people put it on and tried a dozen different ways. I am convinced that the one I got is stiffer than the ones I have seen online. I can tell that the top of the case does not stretch anywhere close to how I've seen it stretch in video demonstrations. I really wanted this to work. I have already started the return process.
customer_reviews.author: interj11

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bezel to further protect my Apple Watch. I use it both with my sport band and it works perfectly. With the Apple watch, I worry about damaging the face of the watch. With the guard, the edges of the guard stand proud of the watch surface to protect in case you drop your watch or if it possibly slides against a surface.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Levine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for when it comes to sleekness and protection. I work with food and having to reach into tight spaces to fill shelves had me worried I would scratch or gouge my watch. After a few months of wearing it everyday in every condition it still looks new and the material has held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Getz

customer_reviews.title: Tried and True To Its Promise
customer_reviews.text: Second time ordering this product. It has completely protected my 42mm Apple Watch. I had the first one nearly 3 years and it started to break down on the bottom side...guessing sweat and water caused the breakdown. Anyway, I like the product and for the price and duration that it lasted, its well worth the money. It truly protects the watch and is nice looking. I actually got a compliment in the Apple store for a customer rep when shopping there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not “logo friendly” for lefty’s.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little cover. Reminds me very much of my G Shock days and that’s why I went with it. Only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is it’s a shame they didn’t think of it being reversed for lefty’s. They have the logo on top and bottom and if they would of flipped it on one side to work for either arm ignition would of been better thought out IMO. Instead I have a totally upside down case 🤦🏻‍♂️🤷🏻‍♂️ Otherwise nice fit and finish to it, and I’m sure will help save my watch from a beating when working on the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme B. Cabott

customer_reviews.title: Durable but fades and gets dirty
customer_reviews.text: It protects your watch. But, after 3 months the rose color is faded and dirty. It does a good job of protecting the watch though. I have cleaned it several times with all sorts of cleaners. None have worked I wear it when I work, work out and don’t take it in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Too big.  Had people looking at it...not in a good way.
customer_reviews.text: Way bigger than I expected. While my wrist is small this made my Apple Watch really feel like a giant device sitting on my wrist. I'm sure that is the price you pay for the cost of protection. However, I noticed several people during conversations I was having would take quick "glances" at my wrist. Mind you, these weren't people I've just met, so they know I have the Apple Watch (no wow factor), but they were just looking at the giant black plastic protector that really made it stand out and just look odd on my wrist. I've stopped using it for day to day use and may reinstall when I hike.
customer_reviews.author: D. Couse

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well protecting my Apple watch. Takes ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well protecting my Apple watch. Takes a minute to get the button and screen aligned. This DOES work with my Zagg screen protector although fit is tight. There is writing on the section that is above and below the face of the watch and since I wear mine with the button and dial on the left side, the writing is upside down. Minor, but noteworthy.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good protection. Nice case.
customer_reviews.text: Use this for work. Works great. Ordered some other brand replacement screen protectors that line up with the edge of this case. The case pushes the screen protector off. May have to stick to Spigen protectors if you want both the case and the screen protector. Also, the first time I put it on I did so with the bands on the watch. That was a pain. Take the bands off to put the case on or off and its easy. It probably said that in the directions, but who has time for directions.
customer_reviews.author: Evad714

customer_reviews.title: Great protection that you won’t lose!
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES this case around his watch. He kept losing the little snap on types and not knowing it. This one encircles the watch so it can’t pop off. It adds a little bulk but is definitely worth it. It makes the watch appear more “rugged.” Skip the snap on guards and get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bus Driver

customer_reviews.title: snug fit with great design that protect your device
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and protects my apple watch but make sure you have a screen protector that lies flat to the sides of the face of the watch - w/o lifting up. Because this is a snug fit, the screen protector will lift off from the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Get this case for your watch
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this case. Was too paranoid I was going to bang the side of my watch and scratch it. Offers protection without making the watch look cheap, actually makes it look awesome. Highly recommend, great product just like companies cellphone cases are.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: Decent case even though it makes the watch look bulky
customer_reviews.text: Even though it is better than the other shell cover that I have, I still feel that this case is inadequate. Not really sure how well it works to protect the watch... haven’t had any incidents and hope that never happens. Also, the side silver button is designed to fit loosely and can be taken off easily by pushing it in from the outside. I did and don’t mind the hole. It wasn’t a good fit and made it hard for me to push the dock button.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjit

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: The case itself is pretty nice and fits the watch very well. The reason for the three stars is that it's been less than a month (or so) and the aluminum button that they tout has already started chipping. I guess I'd rather have the case button chip than the actual button, however, if it might chip then there's no point in the aluminum at all.
customer_reviews.author: H-len

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, doesn't inhibit button and crown use.
customer_reviews.text: This case has saved my screen a few times already. The case top edge is slightly higher than the watch screen and that, along with the corners, has saved me from cracking the glass. The opening for the crown was thoughtfully designed large to allow a finger press without the edge of the case getting in the way. My only complaint is that it looks bulky when I use the lighter colored bands.
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: It Works Great -
customer_reviews.text: Ok, full disclosure. I don't love the look. If you are buying for the sake of protection, this case is great. I bought this after trying 4 other bumpers with this being my last choice. It works but does make my watch bulkier and so but its the only one that has proven of quality. Unfortunately, it takes away the sophisticated and elegant finish and it looks like I'm wearing a sports watch with my suits which is unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: Great product to protect your Apple Watch. This is my second watch due to the first one screen cracking at the corner. This would have probably saved me a lot of headache and time. I won't make the same mistake. Now I just need to find one of these that is for the more classier bands. I use it with this band: top4cus 42mm Medium/Large Soft Silicone...
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Spund

customer_reviews.title: Water holder and edge touch issues
customer_reviews.text: I loved it until I noticed it holds water between watch and case. I sweat a lot and work at a car wash, so.. It is useless to me! The mic wouldn't work and we all know water isn't a friend to tech... Lol.. Over time this would cause issue Apple prob will not warrant. It fits great and was a good design. The issue of sweat being trapped up against watch and limited use of " edge touching" on the screen are probably common on all cases... So be weary of adding this option to your watch.
customer_reviews.author: J. Holley

customer_reviews.title: See John Hamlett’s # 1 review
customer_reviews.text: Looking for better protection, I stumbled across this product. I read the reviews. It’s as good as they say! It does not come with a screen protector. See John Hamlett’s review. He suggests ordering a 38mm screen protector for the 42mm watch protector. Great call!
customer_reviews.author: Marc Peters

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on/take off, GREAT protection!
customer_reviews.text: After watching several review videos of different Apple Watch cases, I finally caved and bought this Rugged Armor one from Spigen, and I am happy to report I have zero regrets. The space black Watch looks absolutely luxurious and classy, but unfortunately I do not attend charity events on a daily basis and thus have no reason to leave something so valuable out to be banged on every wall I will inevitably bump into - as such, Spigen has come to the rescue with the easiest to put on and take off Apple Watch case that works great with even third-party stands.
customer_reviews.author: Tas

customer_reviews.title: Very Meh case
customer_reviews.text: Case is just so so. Bulky which is ok with me. Very hard to install. Doesn’t work with screen protector. Just ok
customer_reviews.author: Ohio guy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome protection
customer_reviews.text: This case protects the Apple Watch very well! I have one on my 38mm Series 3 and just bought one for my husband’s 42mm Series 3. I am very clumsy and have never had a watch glass that lasted without a crack. I use this case all the time and my Apple Watch is in perfect condition. The pink case matches the pink Apple sports band perfectly, and the black one looks great with any color band. I wouldn’t wear my watch without it.
customer_reviews.author: MHB

customer_reviews.title: Love this cover for my apple watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover for my apple watch. Gives it drop protection and the Gshock look. I didn't like the screen protectors, remind me of those children's window clings. I needed the lip to keep me from scratching it. I was wrestling with my son and i dragged my watch face down across the kitchen floor and sand scratched the face of my watch. I also know a nurse friend who dropped theirs out of their locker and the screen shattered. this case will provide all the protection you need against bumps and screen scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Steele

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this case! I've had it now for about a month and I work in a car shop and let me tell you. I have bang and hit my watch so many times now and this case has protected my watch perfectly! I even dropped it the other day on concrete after washing arms and hands and I never thought I would have to worry about dropping my iwatch but it happened and it landed face down and this case protected it perfectly. Deserves a 5 star review all day long!
customer_reviews.author: Potential buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch case!
customer_reviews.text: This case is durable and protects the watch. The fitment is snug and lined up perfectly with the watch. It does ad some bulk to the size, but that's the trade off for protection. The built in side button is durable and works perfectly. This case also works with other bands. I wasn't a fan of the screen protectors. Tried to put one on but couldn't get it lined up properly and the edges peeled back. Currently not using any screen protector with this case! Definitely recommend if u need watch protection!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Parkhurst

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Color
customer_reviews.text: I though the rose gold would be more pink and metallic, but as you can see it's more of a nude. It almost matches my skin color. And it's just rubber, not metallic. Was hard to get on, had to maneuver around the button on the side and the silver piece that controls the vertical button popped out, so I had to pop that back in. You can see in the pic it's a little crooked, I try to straighten it but it's still looks wonky. May be sending it back 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Mary P

customer_reviews.title: Mine didn’t come with the 2 screen protectors...
customer_reviews.text: When I was researching this product, most of the reviews I read (and videos I watched) mentioned that this case comes with 2 screen protection films, and that factored into my decision to buy this. However, I did not receive any screen protectors, only the black case. It appears that Spigen has stopped including them, because they are not mentioned in the product description. So don’t assume (as I did) that just because other customers received 2 screen protectors, that you will too...
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: Ugly and Cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: Actually the ugly and cheap looking part was a feature to me as I intentionally got them for my young daughter and wanted to reduce her peer's attention to her Apple watch anyway. But it also pinches her skin sometimes, so I ended up not being able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: ForCommenting

customer_reviews.title: Does its job, bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Does its job. I would wash it every day at the end of the night while attached to the watch. This thing smelled bad after a few weeks. I didn't want to risk breaking something just removing this every other day. Like I said it does its job, but I wouldn’t recommend it if you plan on wearing it to work out and are a sweaty person like me.
customer_reviews.author: Jess L.

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best, made my watch look more rugged while provide ...
customer_reviews.text: Spigen! Simply the best, made my watch look more rugged while provide excellent protect. People keep complaining about this "scratching their watches), its false. Getting a chrome watch or anything shiny for that matter is prone to scratching with or with out this armor. To those who complain about scratches...man up, its not a rolex, its a smart watch so there is no excuse for you acting stupid! Spigen, remains the best in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S. Loeffler

customer_reviews.title: A good buy!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I singed the material quality by 1 Star is because trying to get the cover over the top round button was crazy. The right side bottom silver piece kept falling out. It’s okay! It seems to have went back in place with no issues. But honestly after The install, so far I’m loving it!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Protecting my investment
customer_reviews.text: Great for my watch I knew I would bang it up so bought this and it’s saved me a lot of damage so far. I tend to forget I’m wearing something that cost a lot this helps me protect my investment. I have a different band I bought also so it’s not the typical Apple band. It fits perfectly and has not issue reaching the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe J. Flores III

customer_reviews.title: Very worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case for my series 3 Nike edition Apple Watch. Looks and feels great. It provides the needed protection without taking away from your cool watch. The side chrome piece came off but popped it back in not a big deal....side note: If you’re going to purchase a screen protector to go along with this case I suggest you order the 38mm screen protector. I purchased the 42mm and the sides were rubbed off by this case due to the interior sides rubbing on the screen. The 38mm took care of that.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: No value
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to protect the screen and sensor. This is a rubber ring that protects the edges. Since it’s a watch, it’s unlikely that I would drop it like a phone. I probably won’t be using it.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Ma

customer_reviews.title: not as Expected, it made my watch look like a fake.
customer_reviews.text: The Case doesn't fit well on my Apple watch series 2 42mm. There are miss alignments, there is a slight inclination in the alignment. the screen guard they have sent is like half of my watch's screen. The case is too rigid, it took a tremendous amount of effort to fit the watch in it. I am completely unsatisfied with the product. :(
customer_reviews.author: Harsha

customer_reviews.title: which also makes it feel like you have limited texting/calling/etc space
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable. The Digital Crown was basically unusable because my finger kept getting stuck on the covering around it. Provides overall OK protection. The side button is also very hard to press because of the protection fully encasing the button. This case makes the screen look smaller than it actually is, which also makes it feel like you have limited texting/calling/etc space. The main purpose was protection, which I guess was covered, but I think they did not focus on customer satisfaction. If this was the only Apple Watch case in the world, I would buy it. But since there are so many other cases that are better than this one, I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Protects well!
customer_reviews.text: it was easy to install and it protects well. The access to the dial works fine with my fingers. The opennings for the mic and speakers do not obstruct any sound. It looks like it will do the job of protection but I would suggest to get a screen protector as I did. I'm all set!
customer_reviews.author: Big pappy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my handicap father Apple Watch.. He can hit the walls in his wheelchair easily.. This works really good for him. Sry pleased with it.. Does the job.. Protects his new watch..
customer_reviews.author: Cheri D. Lovell

customer_reviews.title: Premium wall for Apple watch
customer_reviews.text: Like 1) simple look and easy to put on and off👍🏻 2) As promised it have raised edges to protect the watch from any accident🤕 3)looks sporty😎 4)quality is gud and looks it's from Apple itself ( look compatible with the watch)😊5) comes with 2 screen guards ( save extra money)👏 Dislike Nothing yet and have to wait for some months Photos are not clear and professional and the pdct seems better than from the images thank u
customer_reviews.author: Human22

customer_reviews.title: Works well to help provide extra protection, however the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well to help provide extra protection, however the screen protector that is shipped with it will barely cover the screen. Using a screen protector that covers to every edge causes problems as the case tends to make the corners peel up
customer_reviews.author: jman

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this case
customer_reviews.text: After cracking the crystal after 1 week from purchase, I bought this case. It fits well and comes above the face of the watch for all around protection. If you have an Apple watch, you know the crystal is very vulnerable. I recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Rothman

customer_reviews.title: It's okay. It isn't the easiest to slip on ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. It isn't the easiest to slip on and the small silver coated pvc button fell off and I had some difficulty finding it. But it hasn't slipped out since. The reason for the 3 stars is that the fit isn't snug and there is some wiggle room there and its a rather loose fit. I had read some concerns about it scratching the apple watch it was supposed to protect, but I didn't find that at all. I don't think it is worth the money either.
customer_reviews.author: Ellicottvic

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR APPLE WATCH!!
customer_reviews.text: Dropped my first Apple Watch om the pool deck and cracked it. Didn't take long to affect the face. I bought this product and am very happy with it. I have dropped this watch a few time, though not on concrete, and no damage. I also work outside a lot and will scratch up a crystal pretty quickly. This one, no scratches. I am very happy with this product plus the price was very good. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: J Gile

customer_reviews.title: Deserves 5 stars but you just can't keep it looking good.
customer_reviews.text: The piece is very durable and fashionable when it's new. But after a few months of wear it looks dingy, dirty and faded. I have tried cleaning it but still can't bring back the original look. It does a good job to protect your device, but it looks awful and I can't wear it so it does me no good. This is my 2nd one and they both did the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Sssaldivar

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch protection, no screen protection other than edges.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, iwatch band fits with it great. No complaints yet. Seems to protect the watch nicely. There is no screen protector other than just around the edges are protected. The center of the screen needs to be protected by something else. This case seems to protect enough for my use. Thx
customer_reviews.author: Gary T.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this protective cover. It works great for most everything I do. My earlier Apple Watch had a screen crack, so I knew I needed to protect this one. My only complaint would be it makes the watch quite large. It’s not a huge problem for me, but I could see how it might annoy some.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Moody

customer_reviews.title: Great simple product to add protection to your Watch
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this case. I was worried it was going to make the watch look bulky, but I like the look. I also have all my phones and tablets in heavy otterbox cases, so if you like a minimalist look, you may want to look at a different model. The screen protector can be really tricky to get perfectly lined up. So take your time and do it in super bright light so you can tell the difference between the glass and lcd. the protector only covers the lcd, not to the edge of the glass because of the curve.
customer_reviews.author: dranobob

customer_reviews.title: Not good for serie 3 way bigger than the watch
customer_reviews.text: This cover is bigger than my serie 3 watch it just trash because I don’t like returning product after purchasing especially online
customer_reviews.author: Kk

customer_reviews.title: Durable case for iwatch
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with the army green for some reason. I used to hate the color but it’s growing on me. I’m still on the first gen watch and my screen has never been broken or replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Amanre

customer_reviews.title: Great, tough case
customer_reviews.text: I received the product very quickly, which was great as I wanted to protect my new watch asap. The case fits really well and was quite simple to get on. It is quite bulky so if you were looking for sleek and elegant - this is not the case for you! The package comes with two screen protectors. They are a bit small for my liking so I may get a full screen size protector.
customer_reviews.author: Rk

customer_reviews.title: Safe, rugged, and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I first thought about getting my iwatch I was very hesitant especially the idea of damaging a $400 item. But eventually I gave in so I started the search for the perfect case that didn't interfere with the beauty of the iwatch. Spigen is one of my favorite cases for my iPhone so of course it was one of my number-one choices. After receiving the case and putting it onto my I watch it just looked beautiful it was not too bulky and it just fit perfectly with my black strap. As of right now I am very satisfied I will keep you updated with another review.
customer_reviews.author: Chester Santos

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we expected
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for his watch and is super happy with the product. He is a fireman and they are extremely rough on everything. He breaks every phone case and etc. This so far has lasted great and he has had for a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Bettina

customer_reviews.title: protects but bulky
customer_reviews.text: easy to install rugged and sporty look if you like that protect the sides doesnt protect the screen catches grime and dust around the edges between the screen and the armor.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I have tried few products that are suppose to protect the Apple Watch. This by far the best I have seen. I work with my hands and this item has eliminated the chance of damage to watch. It does not protect the screen but because of the design it drastically reduces possible damage to the screen. Well worth the money. It also very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Dawson

product_meta.title: Spigen Rugged Armor Designed for Apple Watch Case for 42mm Series 3/Series 2/1/Original (2015) - Black
feature_bullets: Flexible TPU allows quick and easy installation
Durable build with a raise of 1.2mm to protect screen
Aluminum button for solid feedback and an easy press
Apple Watch Case Compatible with Apple Watch Series 3/2/1/Original(2015)/Nike+ Sport Edition 42mm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars10,968 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
